comments.html:
It's not here yet, but TCP-AO support in Linux is getting closer.

https://www.phoronix.com/news/TCP-AO-Linux-Kernel-Updated
comments.name: James Harr

comments.html:
TCP-AO support has been merged into what is intended to become Linux 6.7 in a few months:

  • net-next merge
  • Linux TCP-AO documentation
comments.name: Erik Auerswald
